params.text: " Ewwah! Baba ya kusa dawowa Gida. Ina jin ƙaran takalmansa ma– thump thump thump! " Malik yana matuƙar son jin wannan sauti.
Thump! Thump! Thump! “ Kai ka ce kwallo ce take bugun ƙasa, duk da dai na san ƙaran takalman Baba ne ".
Baban Malik ya bashi damar aron takalmansa. Malik yana sha'awar jin sautin Thump thump thump.
Takalman Baba ba dai girma ba. Don sun kusa Malik ɗin shi kan shi girma!
Takalman Baba ba dai tsayi ba. Hoɓɓasa! Yanzu dai Malik na iya miƙewa zumbur.

Yanzu dai ga Malik acikin takalman Baba, shima yana so ya yi kwambo kamar mahaifinsa, Saidai takalman akwai nauyi sosai, Screech... Screech... Screech kawai ka ke ji. Mi ya sa ba na jin sautin Thump thump thump ne?
Hmm, wata-ƙila dai akwai buƙatuwar Malik ya ɗan ƙara daga ƙafafuwansa kaɗan? Kai, wayyo! Waɗannan takalma da nauyi suke.
Nan fa Malik ya zame, datti ya ɓata gurin. Yanzu ya Malik zai goge wajen?
Ko dai kawai ya cire takalman ne? Wayyo! Cinnanka ya cije shi a kafarsa.
Oooh, waɗannan ƙwarin haka suke? Suna tafiya kuma suna ɗauke da abinci?. Amma dai sunyi kama da trelar abinci.
Choo choo! Bodin motar wasan Malik shima zai iya daukar kaya kamar na trela. Choo choo!
kawai sai Malik ya aza kwalaben a Mota mai launin rawaya. Ya sanya gam ɗin a cikin jar mota.
Sai ya sanya ganyayyaki acikin koriyar mota. Saidai motar ta yi ƙanƙanta da yawa.
Kawai sai ya sanya ganyayyakin acikin takalman. Suma takalman suna iya daukan kaya ashe.
Choo choo… Thump thump. Madallah! Malik ya samu doguwar mota. Choo choo... thump thump.
Mahaifin Malik yayi matukar alfahari da shi ganin yadda ya fito kamarsa.

“Takalman Baba” credits

This work, “Takalman Baba” is a derivative of Dad’s Boots. Author: Saptorini. Illustrator: Weny Amalia. Editor: Nurhayati Pujiastuti.
